price: 19. Entonces Al-lah envío un castigo sobre la huerta (un fuego que la abrasó) mientras ellos dormían,
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
